thread.title: 'Mad Money' Lightning Round: Buy General Mills, Not B&G Foods
thread.title_full: 'Mad Money' Lightning Round: Buy General Mills, Not B&G Foods

title: 'Mad Money' Lightning Round: Buy General Mills, Not B&G Foods
text:
Reprint 
Search Jim Cramer's "Mad Money" trading recommendations using our exclusive "Mad Money" Stock Screener . 
NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Here's what Jim Cramer had to say about some of the stocks during the Mad Money Lightning Round Thursday evening: 
Apache ( APA ) : "I don't like Apache. The oil group is under tremendous pressure and that's one I don't want to own." 
Valley National Bancorp ( VLY ) : "That stock can go higher and like that yield." 
TravelCenters of America ( TA ) : "That is a winner. You've got a good one there." 
Skyworks Solutions ( SWKS ) : "I like Skyworks. I think it goes higher." 
B&G Foods ( BGS ) : "No. We just spoke to General Mills ( GIS ) and that's where you want to be." 
Isis Pharmaceuticals ( ISIS ) : "I like Isis. It's not my favorite in the group, but it's fine." 
ABB Ltd ( ABB ) : "No, no thank you. That's not my thing." 
Kinder Morgan ( KMI ) : "This one is down a lot and yields 5%, and that's the sign to buy." 
To read a full recap of "Mad Money" on CNBC , click here . 
To watch replays of Cramer's video segments, visit the Mad Money page on CNBC .
